AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Court: legal body presiding over the case involving defendants Ricardo Rodriguez, Jr. and Ignacio Rodriguez, Jr., citing previous Supreme Court cases to establish the reasonableness of traffic stops

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Texas: state where the roads and departments are located, with areas known for smuggling activity
